title: Drawing, "The Wizard from the Wall, Gas Light and Coke Co.", October 21, 1935
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Walking, abstract figure, dressed as Harlequin, with a cane in one hand and tipping a top hat with the other. At right, a light switch and textured wall (photograph of burlap) beside it. Below: THE WIZARD / COMES OUT OF THE WALL / [lines for type blocked out] / MAKE ELECTRICITY THE SERVANT / IN YOUR HOME.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Wizard from the Wall, Gas Light and Coke Co.", October 21, 1935.
October 21, 1935. Graphite, collage on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-649.
